data.title: Venue Rental — The Delaware Contemporary
data.text:
Looking for the perfect location for a special event? In the heart of the vibrant Riverfront Wilmington, The Delaware Contemporary's industrial chic lobby and contemporary art galleries provide a unique ambiance for any event. We have experience planning and hosting weddings, fundraisers, corporate networking events and everything in between.

Situated amidst an array of attractions and hotels on the Riverfront Wilmington and with convenient, easy access to I-95 and Amtrak, The Delaware Contemporary is a perfect location for out-of-town guests.

Atrium Lobby

The Atrium Lobby provides a premier event setting accentuated with dramatic architectural details. This flexible space is perfect for a full range of special occasions from holiday parties and dinner dances to bar/bat mitzvahs and wedding receptions.

The Atrium Lobby can accommodate an intimate dinner event for 50 or gala affair for 250 guests.

Wings Foundation Auditorium

The Wings Foundation Auditorium is included in all after-hours event rentals and can be used for an array of event needs from a speaker presentation, to a wedding ceremony, to a nightclub style dance space. It is also available for a private rental during business hours.

Galleries

The museum’s seven galleries feature the very best of regionally, nationally, and internationally recognized artists that explore topical issues in contemporary art and society. Open for guests during your event, our contemporary art setting is guaranteed to create lasting memories. Our galleries provide a versatile and engaging backdrop for a cocktail hour, a small wedding ceremony, family celebration, or an intimate dinner.*

*Capacity and availability subject to exhibition calendar

Creative Add-Ons

Customized team-building workshops and creative event activities are available to enhance your guests’ experience! Gallery add-on options include guided tours and interactive art-making activities.

Rates

Rental rates are based on the type and size of an event with discounts offered for non-profit rentals.

Tying the knot?

Book your wedding now at one of WeddingWire's 2016 picks for Best Venue for Art Lovers!

“The Delaware Contemporary is the most unique and unforgettable space, and my guests couldn't stop talking about it. Not to mention the staff, who were accommodating, patient, responsive, and just kind-hearted people all around.”

- Paige, Bride

“Thank you!!! We had the most amazing time. Our guests loved the venue and the night flowed perfectly. We really appreciate all you and your staff did to set up a beautiful night.”

- Meghan & Erik
